name: Dungeon Runner (itch) (simpllrr)
description:
The walls of the catacombs are moving, the floors are shifting, and your wisest choice would be to bolt your way out of there

Dungeon Runner is a retro infinite runner. Weave your way through a never-ending tunnel of dangers, treasures, and total darkness, collecting powerups to keep the flame alive!

QUICK, SIMPLE YET CHALLENGING

Utilizing a single button, Dungeon Runner tests your reflexes in a simple, masterful way. Even if you're presented with a GAME OVER, you can simply jump back in to the experience with its quick, straightforward nature.

TINY AND RETRO 

Made with a bunch of small squares, the overall art is constructed with a 4-colour design. Intended to be simple and pleasing, the core aesthetic provides an exceptional system without drawing a distraction from the primary experience.

PACKED WITH SOUNDS 

Composed to sound energetic, fun, and fitting, with an 8-bit chiptune flavour.
